snippet.title: MOTHERGUNSHIP - Resistance Trailer
snippet.description:
MOTHERGUNSHIP mixes bullet-hell intensity with the shooting, customization, and traversal of the first-person genre. Fight your way through the alien fleets, facing randomized enemy and level mayhem as you clear rooms and take out some of the biggest bosses seen in the FPS genre.
Wishlist the game on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/574090

Join the Resistance and get all the latest news and updates! 
Official website: http://www.mothergunship.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mothergunship
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mothergunship

Grip Digital website: http://www.grip-digital.com/
Grip Digital Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Grip-Digital...
Grip Digital Twitter: https://twitter.com/grip_digital
Joe Mirabello's Twitter: https://twitter.com/blankslatejoe
